mapper.insert: insert into score (sbno, m_id, s_id, s_score, s_comment, s_date) values (seq_score.nextval, #{m_id}, #{s_id}, #{s_score}, #{s_comment}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from score where s_id = #{s_id} and m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.update: update score set s_score = #{s_score}, s_comment = #{s_comment} where sbno=#{sbno}
mapper.select: select * from score where s_id = #{s_id} and sbno>0
